DOC.brief_title: Using mHealth Aid Opioid Medication Adherence Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate usability medication management aid opioid dependence name SubAID . The SubAID system smartphone application medication monitor design optimize adherence behavior OD patient responsible administer bup/nal maintenance therapy medication . Usability SubAID system test utilizing 3-Stage study design 5 week period among cohort subject prescribe bup/nal undergoing OST . - Stage 1 - 1 week : Participants use electronic medication monitor ( MedSignals ) control mode passively record baseline adherence medication . - Stage 2 - 2 week : Participants use MedSignals control mode smartphone application . - Stage 3 - 2 week : Participants use MedSignals active mode smartphone application . After stage usability assessment conduct evaluate satisfaction product participant .
